languages.text: {n}Маражай кидает на вас взгляд и наигранным жестом пожимает плечами — жест, который он явно перенял у людей.{/n}
{n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай кидает на вас взгляд и наигранным жестом пожимает плечами — жест, который он явно перенял у людей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich an und zuckt mit den Schultern — eine künstliche Geste, die er offenkundig von Menschen übernommen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich an und zuckt mit den Schultern — eine künstliche Geste, die er offenkundig von Menschen übernommen hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看了你一眼，耸了耸肩。这种不自然的动作显然是在模仿人类。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看了你一眼，耸了耸肩。这种不自然的动作显然是在模仿人类。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous lance un regard et hausse les épaules, un geste artificiel qu'il a clairement copié sur les humains.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous lance un regard et hausse les épaules, un geste artificiel qu'il a clairement copié sur les humains.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira de reojo y se encoge de hombros, un gesto que ha adoptado de los humanos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira de reojo y se encoge de hombros, un gesto que ha adoptado de los humanos.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあなたへと視線を向け、わざとらしく肩をすくめる。明らかに人間から学んだ仕草だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはあなたへと視線を向け、わざとらしく肩をすくめる。明らかに人間から学んだ仕草だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana bakıyor ve insanları taklit ettiği belli, yapmacık bir jestle omuz silkiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a glance at you and shrugs in a contrived gesture he has clearly adopted from humans.{/n}
